course_description: This course surveys recent empirical and theoretical developments in the field of international finance and open-economy macroeconomics. Topics may include: basic balance-of-payments theory, real exchange rate and the terms of trade, international business cycle models, exchange rate dynamics, and international macroeconomic policy coordination.
sections: Class Nbr: 2882, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: V. Yue, Status: Open
